name: Healing Wish
summary: Causes the user to faint. The next Pokemon to switch in on the user's side will have all their HP restored and status ailments cured.
viability: Healing Wish can be really useful to give way to a late game sweeper. If a Pokemon like Latias is on its final breath, use Healing Wish to have it leave the battle, then restore the HP and statuses of a crippled sweeper. It can turn the entire tide of a match so quickly.
